name: buckleypaul-claude-skills
description: suite of miscellaneous skills for work and life

plugins.name: git-commit-cleanup
plugins.description: Clean up messy commit histories by creating a new branch with logical, small, and easily reviewable commits that lead to the same end state.

plugins.name: standup
plugins.description: Generate daily standup reports by aggregating activity from Slack, Jira, Confluence, GitHub, and Gmail

plugins.name: serial-console-skill
plugins.description: Test firmware connected over serial consoles with automated expect scripts

plugins.name: pyhubblenetwork
plugins.description: Test and provision Hubble Network devices using the pyhubblenetwork SDK
